A Pure (Halfling) Rogue for Arelith.

To use a Shortbow with deadly sneak attacks please.


Using the Arelith Character Creation, the build will have a 32 SR on creation (With +2 ECL).

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:

are you requesting a 30-level build or a 28-level one? A 30 level design would end up as a Level 32 toon, no?

Are there any special variants (i.e. subtypes) available to the rogue class
or
ability/feat alterations for the halfling race on Arelith beyond the standard race bias(es)?

posts.author: johnbonmovi
posts.content:
32 SR is not going to be effective at all at endgame if that's what you're planning for and thus not worth the ECL that will make leveling take mind numbingly longer.

Also there really isn't much to a build if you just want big sneak attacks with nothing else, pump up dex, take epic sneak attack, and take some fighter or bard levels at epic to dump discipline/grab an epic skill focus in it. Bow sneak attacks are somewhat unreliable and the bow suffers a penalty to hit knockdown'd targets making it not really the weapon of choice for sneaks.
